rootCause: Avahi configuration did not enforce IPv4-only publishing when WLAN is disabled or IPv6 interferes, leading to self-check IPv4 resolution failures on Raspberry Pi OS.
resolution: configure_avahi.sh now sets use-ipv4=yes and use-ipv6=no under [server] when SUGARKUBE_MDNS_IPV4_ONLY=1, ensuring browse/resolve aligns with IPv4 assumptions.
